revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD 951 |revision=-2n (RB951-2n) |upc=700175496089 |ean= |asin=B008W7WEV6,B00DBT6NJE |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/11/2012 |manuf_country=Latvia |is_manufNo |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TV7RB951-2N |ic_id= |pwr_v=30 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331;AR9331-AL1A; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1208U0C-PCB0 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331;AR9331-AL1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=MikroTik |default_ssid_regex=^MikroTik$ |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:0C:42,D4:CA:6D |oui_eth=00:0C:42,D4:CA:6D }} '''Home Wireless Router / AP''' :[http://routerboard.com/RB951-2n Product page]
"48RNAA14.SGA" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Manuf. by [[Wistron NeWeb]], OUI: 00:0C:42 / D4:CA:6D
Default SSID and credentials are from the FCC submitted Quick Setup Guide. :Device may have a USB 2.0 port on some models / submodels.
*[http://itsettings.blogspot.com/2012/03/mikrotik-routerboard-951-2n.html ''RB951-2n'' Specs] *[http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-marshrutizatora-Mikrotik-RB951G-2HnD ''RB951G-2HnD'' Review] {{see also|Wistron NeWeb|MikroTik}}
===See also=== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 951-2n (RB951-2n)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB951-2n RB951-2n] ('''RB951-2n''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB951-2N TV7RB951-2N] :2.4GHz Wireless AP, 802.11bgn, 5x FE ports, PoE, :PoE-out on port 5, OUI: 00:0C:42 / D4:CA:6D :CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9331 @400MHz, 64/32MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 951G-2HnD (RB951G-2HnD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB951G-2HnD RB951G-2HnD] ('''RB951G-2HnD''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB951G-2HND TV7RRB951G-2HND] :2.4GHz Wireless AP, 802.11bgn, 5x GbE ports, 1x USB 2.0, PoE :POE-in/out on port 1/5, 2x MIMO 2.5dBi ant., OUI: D4:CA:6D :CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9344 @600MHz, 128/128MB <!--(Samsung NAND/2x Nanya DDR)--> ([http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-marshrutizatora-Mikrotik-RB951G-2HnD review]) *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP (RB951Ui-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB951Ui-2nD RB951Ui-2nD] ('''hAP''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB951UI-2ND TV7RB951UI-2ND] :5x FE ports, PoE-out on port 5, USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 00:0C:42, :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, 16/64MB, 24V/0.8A <!--(Flash Winbond (SPI)/RAM Nanya (DDR2))-->
